feed.title: Scaling Bitcoin - summarizing non-jgarzik block size BIPs

entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin - summarizing non-jgarzik block size BIPs
entry.summary: Kanzure has requested a quick summary of non-jgarzik block size BIPs to be covered. The Scaling Bitcoin conference organizers have given extra time for this purpose. The serious BIPs include 100.5, 103, 105, and 106. Those who would like to contribute input before Dec 7 can email Jeff at bloq.com.
